data.title: Kim Kardashian’s Ex Boyfriends And Husbands Before Kanye West – Including Kris...
data.meta_description: Kim Kardashian is single after her split from Odell Beckham Jr. Here's a look back her past boyfriends and husbands as she prepares for love once more.
data.text:
Kim Kardashian’s Ex-Boyfriends And Husbands Before Kanye West – Including Kris Humphries And Ray J

Kim Kardashian is single again after her split from Odell Beckham Jr, let's take a look back her past boyfriends and husbands.

Kim Kardashian has had a long and complicated past with ex-boyfriends and former husbands including the likes of Pete Davidson, Kanye West, Kris Humphries and Damon Thomas.

However, despite being unlucky in love so far, the mother of four has aired her hopes of finding true love once more on the family show, The Kardashians, and in the meantime is keeping busy with her prison-reform campaign, TV roles and fashion events like the recent Met Gala.

Following her most recent break up with Odell Beckham Jr, and a divorce from rapper Kanye, Kim is reportedly less interested in the dating scene and is focused on being a 'hands-on mum'.

Read more: How Many Kids Does Kim Kardashian Have? Names, Ages And Pictures Revealed

Read more: Kim Kardashian And Taylor Swift's Complicated Feud Explained

Read more: Why Did Kourtney Kardashian's Baby Have Foetal Surgery?

So who has Kim dated before? And who are her ex-husbands? Here's a look at her full dating history.

Kim Kardashian and Damon Thomas

With an age gap of 10 years between them, Kim was just 19 when she married music producer Damon Thomas.

Their marriage lasted three years from 2000 to 2003, with Kim claiming in the divorce papers he had become controlling.

Although Kim rarely spoke about their relationship, she did reveal to Scott Discick in an episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians she was “on ecstasy” when she married Damon.

Kim Kardashian and Ray J

Now best known as the rapper who made a sex tape with Kim, Ray J dated the reality TV queen on and off from 2002 until 2007, which is when the singer is said to have sold their, erm, intimate video.

Talk of their relationship re-surfaced recently, when Ray J claimed a second sex tape of them together exists and that Kim has always had possession of the tapes.

Kim Kardashian and Nick Lachey

Kim dated TV star Nick Lachey in 2006 following his high-profile divorce from Jessica Simpson.

Years after splitting from Kim, Nick claimed she used him for publicity, telling a US tabloid: “We went to a movie. No one followed us there. Somehow, mysteriously, when we left, there were 30 photographers waiting outside.”

Kim Kardashian and Nick Cannon

Kim and TV presenter Nick dated from 2006 to 2007 and apparently split over the sex tape she’d made with Ray J.

Nick, who shares two children with ex-wife Mariah Carey, said on The Howard Stern Show: “This was my issue. We talked about this tape…And she told me there was no tape… She’s actually one of the nicest people you’ll ever meet. But the fact that she lied and told me that there was no tape?”

Kim Kardashian and Reggie Bush

Kim and NFL star Reggie dated from 2007 to 2009 before breaking up and later reuniting, but they eventually ended amicably.

Kim Kardashian and Miles Austin

Despite branding their romance “the real deal”, Kim and American football player Miles split in 2010 following a long-distance romance.

According to People there was “no huge reason except their distance apart” that led to their split.

Kim Kardashian and Kris Humphries

Who can forget Kim and basketball player Kris were married for just 72 days in 2011?

Kris later described their marriage as “brutal but 100 per cent real” when hit by claims their relationship was fake.

Kim Kardashian and Kanye West

Kim and Kanye started dating in 2012 and they married in 2014. Together, they have four children, North, Saint, Chicago and Psalm.

Early on in 2021, it was revealed Kim and Kanye are getting a divorce, with Kim saying their separate lives – Kanye spends most of his time in Wyoming – simply weren't working.

Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson

Kim and Pete dated for nine months before deciding to call it quits at the start of August 2022.

Rumours began to whirr online about their relationship at the beginning of November 2021 after Kim and Pete Davidson were spotted celebrating Halloween together days after her SNL debut.

Speculation around their romance swirled for months before Kim finally decided to post about her new boyfriend on Instagram, then they hard launched their relationship hand-in-hand at the Met Gala 2022.

Pete made a brief appearance in The Kardashians season two, which began filming before they went their separate ways.

Pete and Kim broke up after they had to make things work long-distance while he was working on a film in Australia. According to Entertainment Tonight their schedules became so busy the spark between them had 'faded'.

Kim Kardashian and Odell Beckham Jr

Kim and OBJ were first romantically linked in September 2023 and their relationship was seemingly confirmed when they seen together at the 2024 Super Bowl.

But nine months after the romance rumours began, they couple have decided to part ways. A source told ET: ""Kim and Odell have been doing their own things lately.

"Kim is so busy and hasn't been putting any pressure on herself to be committed to anyone or in a serious relationship. She is all about being a hands-on mom."

Kim and Odell were friends long before they started dating and the source said they have returned to that friendship. "They had a good thing and there aren't any hard feelings on either side," they added.

"They started as friends and still are. They will continue to be respectful of each other's spaces, careers, families, and friends."
